scripts.cy:chrome: npx cypress run --config video=false --env allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.cy:chrome:video: npx cypress run --config video=true --env allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.test:headless: npx npm-run-all allure:clear cy:headless allure:generate allure:open
scripts.test:chrome: npx npm-run-all allure:clear cy:chrome allure:generate allure:open
